import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); const { id: productId } = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ const fetchProduct = async () =>{ const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/`) } fetchProduct(); },[productId]); console.log(product); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: Rs.{product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: Rs.{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ?'In Stock':'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
